name: NewVibesRadio
0:
”Alexa, open new vibes radio”
”Alexa, start new vibes radio”
”Alexa, ask new vibes radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new vibes radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to New Vibes Radio! Immerse yourself in the ultimate online radio experience that unites DJs and hosts from Africa, Jamaica, and the UK. New Vibes Radio offers a diverse mix of Afrobeat, Afro-Swing, Dancehall, Reggae, Classic Soul, RnB, UK Charts, Bongo Flava, Taarab, and Asian Flavour Hits.

Our station is designed to keep you entertained and motivated with a fresh, happy-go-lucky, and positive vibe. We focus on playing more music and less talk, ensuring you get the best hits around the clock.

Key Features:

Wide Range of Genres: From Afrobeat to RnB and Classic Soul.
Global Reach: Interactive fanbase and multicultural audience.
Variety of Content: News, Current Affairs, Lifestyle, Entertainment, and Social Features.
Interactive and Engaging: Reviews, interviews, trends, and more.
Join us on New Vibes Radio and enjoy Tomorrow’s Vibes, Trends Today! Keeping it simple and interactive, we bring you the latest reviews, hottest DJs, trending artists, and their truths. You Say It! We Play It!

Tune in on Alexa for a fresh take on traditional radio and connect with the vibrant global community.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
